Complexity Results about Pure Nash Equilibria

Theorem Deciding whether a strategic game in GNF with |neighi| 1 for all i has a pure strategy Nash equilibrium is NL-complete. Hardness holds even if |{ui (c)|c C}| 2 for all i .
